synopsis.text: Kaiser and Favaro find themselves revisiting Favaro's hometown in the first of two compelling tales, set in the interim of the initial and subsequent series of Shingeki no Bahamut: Genesis. The second tale unveils the motivations behind Kaiser's and Jeanne's continued allegiance to the Orleans Knights following their climactic battle against Bahamut, as they engage in a thrilling sparring match. These captivating narratives provide a deeper understanding of the characters' choices and their evolving relationships.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
